00025 // check if this file included directly
00026 if (!defined('REPORT_DIRECT_INCLUDE')) {
00027     // main system configuration
00028     require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00029     // start the session
00030     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00031     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00032     include SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00033     include SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00034 }
00035 
00036 // privileges checking
00037 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'r');
00038 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'w');
00039 
00040 if (!$can_read) {
00041     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');
00042 }
00043 
00044 ob_start();
00045 // check if there is any active stock take proccess
00046 $stk_query = $dbs->query("SELECT * FROM stock_take WHERE is_active=1");
00047 if ($stk_query->num_rows < 1) {
00048     echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('NO stock taking proccess initialized yet!').'</div>';
00049 } else {
00050     // get stock take data
00051     $stk_data = $stk_query->fetch_assoc();
00052     // check if this file included directly
00053     if (!defined('REPORT_DIRECT_INCLUDE') AND !isset($_GET['print'])) {
00054 ?>
00055     <fieldset class="menuBox">
00056         <div class="menuBoxInner reportIcon">
00057         <?php echo strtoupper(__('CURRENT STOCK TAKE REPORT')); ?>
00058         <hr />
00059         <form name="printForm" action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']; ?>" target="submitPrint" id="printForm" method="get" style="display: inline;">
00060         <input type="hidden" name="print" value="true" /><input type="submit" value="<?php echo __('Download Report'); ?>" class="button" />
00061         </form>
00062         <iframe name="submitPrint" style="visibility: hidden; width: 0; height: 0;"></iframe>
00063         </div>
00064     </fieldset>
00065 <?php
00066     }
00067     $table = new simbio_table();
00068     $table->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0"';
00069     // make an array for report table row
00070     $report_row[__('Stock Take Name')] = $stk_data['stock_take_name'];
00071     $report_row[__('Total Item Stock Taked')] = $stk_data['total_item_stock_taked'];
00072     // stock take item lost
00073     $report_row[__('Total Item Lost')] = intval($stk_data['total_item_lost']);
00074     if ($report_row[__('Total Item Lost')] < 1) {
00075         $report_row[__('Total Item Lost')] = __('None');
00076     }
00077     // stock take item on loan
00078     if (empty($stk_data['total_item_loan'])) {
00079         $report_row[__('Total Item On Loan')] = __('None');
00080     } else {
00081         $report_row[__('Total Item On Loan')] = $stk_data['total_item_loan'];
00082     }
00083     // stock take total checked item
00084     $checked_count = $stk_data['total_item_stock_taked']-$stk_data['total_item_lost'];
00085     $checked_procent = floor(($checked_count/$stk_data['total_item_stock_taked'])*100);
00086     $progress_bar = '<div style="height: 15px; border: 1px solid #999999; background-color: red;"><div style="height: 15px; width: '.$checked_procent.'%; background-color: #3161ff;">&nbsp;</div></div>';
00087     $report_row[__('Total Checked/Scanned Items')] = $checked_count.' ('.$checked_procent.'%) '.$progress_bar;
00088     // stock take participants data
00089     $report_row[__('Stock Take Participants')] = '<ul>';
00090         // get other stock take users
00091         $st_other_users_q = $dbs->query('SELECT DISTINCT checked_by, COUNT(item_id) AS num_count FROM stock_take_item GROUP BY checked_by ORDER BY `num_count` DESC');
00092         while ($st_other_users_d = $st_other_users_q->fetch_row()) {
00093             if ($st_other_users_d[0] != $stk_data['stock_take_users']) {
00094                 $report_row[__('Stock Take Participants')] .= '<li>'.$st_other_users_d[0].' ('.$st_other_users_d[1].' '.__('items already checked').')</li>'; //mfc
00095             }
00096         }
00097         // destroy query object
00098         unset($st_other_users_q);
00099     $report_row[__('Stock Take Participants')] .= '</ul>';
00100     // stock take start date
00101     $report_row[__('Start Date')] = nl2br($stk_data['start_date']);
00102     // stock take end date
00103     $report_row[__('End Date')] = nl2br($stk_data['end_date']);
00104 
00105     // initial row count
00106     $row = 1;
00107     foreach ($report_row as $headings => $report_data) {
00108         $table->appendTableRow(array($headings, ':', $report_data));
00109         // set cell attribute
00110         $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'class="alterCell" style="width: 170px;"');
00111         $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'class="alterCell" style="width: 1%;"');
00112         $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'class="alterCell2" style="width: auto;"');
00113         $row++;
00114     }
00115     /* GENERAL REPORT */
00116     echo $table->printTable();
00117 
00118     /* DECIMAL CLASSES ITEM STATUS */
00119     $class_num = 0;
00120     $row_class = 'alterCell';
00121     $arr_status = array('m', 'e', 'l');
00122     $class_count_str = '<table align="center" class="border" style="width: 100%; margin-top: 5px;" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0">';
00123     $class_count_str .= '<tr><td class="dataListHeader">'.__('Classification').'</td>
00124         <td class="dataListHeader">'.__('Lost Items').'</td>
00125         <td class="dataListHeader">'.__('Existing Items').'</td>
00126         <td class="dataListHeader">'.__('On Loan Items').'</td></tr>';
00127     while ($class_num < 10) {
00128         $row_class = ($class_num%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00129         $class_count_str .= '<tr><td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong>'.$class_num.'</strong>'.__(' classes').'</td>'; //mfc
00130         foreach ($arr_status as $status) {
00131             $cls_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(item_code) FROM stock_take_item WHERE TRIM(classification) LIKE '$class_num%' AND status='$status'");
00132             $cls_d = $cls_q->fetch_row();
00133             // append to string
00134             $class_count_str .= '<td class="'.$row_class.'">'.$cls_d[0].'</td>';
00135         }
00136         $class_count_str .= '</tr>';
00137         $class_num++;
00138     }
00139 
00140     /* NON DECIMAL NUMBER CLASSES ITEM STATUS */
00141     $cls_q = $dbs->query("SELECT DISTINCT classification FROM stock_take_item WHERE TRIM(classification) NOT REGEXP '^[0123456789]'");
00142     while ($cls_d = $cls_q->fetch_row()) {
00143         $row_class = ($row_class == 'alterCell')?'alterCell2':'alterCell';
00144         $class_count_str .= '<tr><td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong>'.$cls_d[0].'</strong> classes</td>';
00145         foreach ($arr_status as $status) {
00146             $cls_count_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(item_code) FROM stock_take_item WHERE TRIM(classification)='".$cls_d[0]."' AND status='$status'");
00147             $cls_count_d = $cls_count_q->fetch_row();
00148             // append to string
00149             $class_count_str .= '<td class="'.$row_class.'">'.$cls_count_d[0].'</td>';
00150         }
00151         $class_count_str .= '</tr>';
00152     }
00153     /* DECIMAL CLASSES AND NON DECIMAL NUMBER ITEM STATUS END */
00154 
00155     // table end
00156     $class_count_str .= '</table>';
00157     echo $class_count_str;
00158 
00159     /* COLLECTION TYPE ITEM STATUS */
00160     $coll_type_count_str = '<table align="center" class="border" style="width: 100%; margin-top: 5px;" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0">';
00161     $coll_type_count_str .= '<tr><td class="dataListHeader">'.__('Collection Type').'</td>
00162         <td class="dataListHeader">'.__('Lost Items').'</td>
00163         <td class="dataListHeader">'.__('Existing Items').'</td>
00164         <td class="dataListHeader">'.__('On Loan Items').'</td></tr>';
00165     $ct_q = $dbs->query("SELECT DISTINCT coll_type_name FROM stock_take_item");
00166     $row = 1;
00167     while ($ct_d = $ct_q->fetch_row()) {
00168         $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00169         $coll_type_count_str .= '<tr><td class="'.$row_class.'"><strong>'.$ct_d[0].'</strong></td>';
00170         foreach ($arr_status as $status) {
00171             $ct_count_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(item_code) FROM stock_take_item WHERE coll_type_name='".$ct_d[0]."' AND status='$status'");
00172             $ct_count_d = $ct_count_q->fetch_row();
00173             // append to string
00174             $coll_type_count_str .= '<td class="'.$row_class.'">'.$ct_count_d[0].'</td>';
00175         }
00176         $coll_type_count_str .= '</tr>';
00177         $row++;
00178     }
00179 
00180     // table end
00181     $coll_type_count_str .= '</table>';
00182     echo $coll_type_count_str;
00183     /* COLLECTION TYPE ITEM STATUS END */
00184 
00185     // output report
00186     $report_content = ob_get_clean();
00187 
00188     // check if we are on printed mode
00189     if (isset($_GET['print'])) {
00190         // html strings
00191         $html_str = '<html><head><title>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' Current Stock Take Report</title>';
00192         $html_str .= '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00193         $html_str .= 'body {padding: 0.2cm}'."\n";
00194         $html_str .= 'body * {color: black; font-size: 11pt;}'."\n";
00195         $html_str .= 'table {border: 1px solid #000000;}'."\n";
00196         $html_str .= '.dataListHeader {background-color: #000000; color: white; font-weight: bold;}'."\n";
00197         $html_str .= '.alterCell {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #CCCCCC;}'."\n";
00198         $html_str .= '.alterCell2 {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #FFFFFF;}'."\n";
00199         $html_str .= '</style>'."\n";
00200         $html_str .= '</head>';
00201         $html_str .= '<body>'."\n";
00202         $html_str .= '<h3>'.$sysconf['library_name'].' - Current Stock Take Report</h3>';
00203         $html_str .= '<hr size="1" />'."\n";
00204         $html_str .= $report_content;
00205         $html_str .= '<script type="text/javascript">self.print();</script>'."\n";
00206         $html_str .= '</body></html>'."\n";
00207         // write to file
00208         $file_write = @file_put_contents(REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.'stock_take_print_result.html', $html_str);
00209         if ($file_write) {
00210             // open result in new window
00211             echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'/'.FILES_DIR.'/'.REPORT_DIR.'/stock_take_print_result.html\', \'popMemberReport\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00212         } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Membership statistic report failed to generate, possibly because '.REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00213         exit();
00214     } else {
00215         echo $report_content;
00216     }
00217 }
